summary: Seasoned Business Systems Analyst with experience delivering multi-regional CRM/database marketing solutions for Fortune 500 clients. Proficient in data integration, CDI, marketing analytics, change management, and cross-functional stakeholder collaboration; strong background in SAP Web Intelligence, Informatica, SQL, and campaign management.

experience.title: Business Systems Analyst I
experience.description: Acted as lead BSA on client team to drive consistency and support projects spanning multiple regional databases and support teams. Primary contact for client, client partners and other stakeholders, managing daily responsibilities associated with delivering multi-channel database marketing programs. Partner with the client, client partners and other stakeholders to define campaign audience requirements, program specifications and business requirements. Projects included SMB CRM Marketing Database Solution, Consumer Global Marketing Database Solution for Latin America, and Dell Financial Services. Responsibilities included requirements gathering, artifact creation (BRD/FSD), data analysis, data quality, change requests, and coordination with development, QA, and production teams.

experience.title: IT Analyst Intern
experience.description: Assisted IT Admin for managing user access rights, user groups and documentation upload on MS SharePoint. Analyzed business applications, gathered requirements, and converted them into detailed technical and functional specifications. Served as a technical liaison between end-users and application vendors, tested solutions, and generated customized BI reports.

experience.title: IT Support
experience.description: Used Sys-Aid ticketing software for handling service requests from library staff. Troubleshooted and maintained hardware and software devices. Maintained Local Area Network and performed Ghosting, G-Disking processes.
